QuestData.Title: The Razorbloom
QuestData.Description: The Laughing Skull shaman Kaz ran off while we were coming here.$b$bShe claimed to be looking for more of her people in the jungles to the south.$b$bDraka insisted on following her to safeguard us against betrayal.$b$bCommander, if Kaz is telling the truth, then she and Draka are going to need all the help they can get.$b$bWill you join them? They could not have gotten far.$b$bThis could prove to be the perfect test for your new shredder and lumber mill resources.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Draka and Kaz at the Razorbloom.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Draka at the Razorbloom.
QuestData.RewardText: My husband sent you, didn't he?$b$bNormally I would laugh at that, but seeing these horrors, Kaz and I could use all the help we can get.
